content:
Answer two questions about the following table.

The number of songs that can fit on a hard drive depends on its storage space. 

|  | |
- | :-: | :-:| :-:| :-:
Songs | $100$ | $200$| $400$ 
Storage space $(\text{GB})$ | $0.5$ | $1$ | $2$ 

**Plot the ordered pairs from the table.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]

**Is the number of songs that can fit on a hard drive proportional to its storage space?**

[[☃ radio 1]]
